segments.text: The kitchen layout is straightforward, with counters and cabinets in view.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows steadily from the faucet into the overflowing sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is drying a plate, her back somewhat to the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy stands on a stool, accessing the upper cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby reaches up, participating in the cookie retrieval.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window offers a glimpse of a tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool's instability adds a hint of concern.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water puddle expands across the floor tiles.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack neatly on the counter, waiting to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's foot dips into the water without her noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This domestic scene hides subtle risks beneath the surface.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookies look homemade and appealing in their jar.
segments.speaker: PAR
